headline: This pro-life Democrat supports ending Roe | Letters
sentences: Joe Biden is the smiling, kind gentleman who sits on your bed, sniffs your hair, holds your hand and says, Not to worry, Ive been doing this a very long time.? When he leaves the room, you feel reassured and that everything will be all right.

Dot Clark, Apollo Beach
Trumps strengths
Election 2022: JD Vance wins Ohios GOP Senate primary | May 5
Whenever someone tells me that Donald Trump is too brash or crude, I like to make the following analogy.
Trump is the curt surgeon who rushes into your hospital room, gruffly introduces himself, asks if you have any questions, hurriedly answers them and rushes out the door.
Since the Roe decision, more than 63 million abortions have been performed in our nation, a deeply troubling statistic that I believe is tantamount to infanticide.

Im a pro-life Democrat
Even if Roe stands, things have changed here | May 5
I am a proud pro-life Democrat who has long supported overturning Roe v. Wade.
Since we are telling others what to do with their bodies, lets pass a law that every man who is not paying his child support must be sterilized.
There would most likely be an abortion clinic on every street corner with the government covering the costs and any charges.
As a woman, it is my body  and my accidentally fertilized egg  so in all fairness what I do about it is my private business.

Charles Michael Sitero, Ormond Beach
Following their leader
Will Floridas Republican Legislature ban abortion?
Ours is a civilized society, and we should be protecting life, not wantonly stamping it out, on demand.

Even if Roe stands, things have changed here | May 5
What if men had the babies?
With Trump, you are waking up after two hours of surgery.

| May 4
What will Floridas Legislature do about abortion?
I believe Republican legislators will do whatever Gov.

Michael Mayo, St. Petersburg
If men gave birth ...
With Biden, your family has to plan your funeral.
The my body, my choice? mantra is a selfish one.
A child is a blessing, and life is precious.
A fertilized egg is not a baby.
Ron DeSantis tells them to do.
Ever think about that?
Carol Hess, Hudson
